reviewtext: This is a solid product for a great price.  You don't need the accompanying CD-ROM to set it up.  In my case, I hooked it up to a Toshiba cable modem and followed the quick start guide to configure the settings.  It didn't work right away.  A quick call to my cable modem provider revealed that I needed to turn the cable modem off and back on so it can "tolerate" the router.So when you set this up for the first time, be sure to restart both the router and the cable modem after you configure it.
summary: Good product, manual could be better
